name: Ruthless Iron Hand/无情铁手
description:
(The Web Unity may have some bugs, you can download the pc version to get better experience)

Use W,A,S,D to move.

Use Mouse to aim your target, and use Right Click to Attack

Use Space to Dash

The Demo of our pixel game -- Ruthless iron hand.
This is a top-down 2D pixel high-pace combat game.
Using your iron hand crash your enemy!
Made by LuWu Studio.

Also look for artists or other members who are interested in our game style and independent game development that could work together for subsequent development.
The team's follow-up plan has a Roguelike pixel arts game with Chinese Wuxia background. 

无情铁手Demo 2D俯仰视角快节奏战斗游戏。

 用你的铁手碾碎你的敌人！ 

--陆吾工作室

另寻对我们游戏风格感兴趣的以及对独立游戏开发有兴趣的美工或其他成员一起进行后续开发。

团队后续计划有一款Roguelike类武侠风像素游戏。
